metadata.description: A super-secret mission from the High Council drops Sela right in the middle of a war zone. When a surprise attack by the Dark Horde knocks her out of commission it's up to America's finest to get her and the valuable item she carries out of the fire fight in one piece. All that stands in their way is the Dark One and his enchanted army.  This very special issue is dedicated to the Service Men and Women of the United States military and a portion of the books profits will be donated to the Wounded Warrior Foundation. Double Sized issue!
metadata.name: Wounded Warriors
